duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot, maintain, repair, and modify automotive manufacturing and test equipment to improve systems uptime and reliability.
Oversee equipment modifications for process changes, new models, and expansions.
Maintain and update all process documentation.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree in a technical manufacturing discipline and 2 years of automation/PLC controls with industrial maintenance, mechanical, electronic systems & PC controls.

High school diploma/GED and 2 years technical maintenance experience PLUS 2 years automation/PLC controls with industrial maintenance, mechanical, electronic systems & PC controls (4 years total experience).
